sentences.en: Any attempt to defend wilderness preservation must confront and attempt to refute this position.
sentences.cn: 任何为保护荒野而辩护的试图都必须正视并设法驳倒这一论点.

sentences.en: As for the Flat Earth theory, I believe I could refute it.
sentences.cn: 至于地平学说, 我相信我能驳斥它.

sentences.en: Good books are irrefutable, and bad books refute themselves.
sentences.cn: 好书难以辩驳, 而坏书驳倒自已.

sentences.en: He had hardly finished when someone rose to refute his points.
sentences.cn: 他还没全说完,就有人起来反驳他的论点.

sentences.en: He then asked whether I could refute that impression.
sentences.cn: 该记者接着问我,是否能够推翻人们的这种印象.

sentences.en: Isabelle is quick to refute any suggestion of intellectual snobbery.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔对于任何关于她恃才傲物的暗示都迅速予以否认。

sentences.en: It goes without saying that we have the right to refute them publicly.
sentences.cn: 不用说我们有权公开驳斥他们.

sentences.en: It was the kind of rumour that it is impossible to refute.
sentences.cn: 这是那种让人根本没法批驳的谣言。

sentences.en: Nothing could refute her testimony that the driver was drunk.
sentences.cn: 她关于那个司机已经喝醉的证词无可辩驳.

sentences.en: Silence is one of the hardest things to refute.
sentences.cn: 沉默是最难驳斥的事物之一.

sentences.en: Taking up the challenge, he wrote an article to refute his erroneous views.
sentences.cn: 他接受挑战, 写了一篇文章驳斥他的错误观点.

sentences.en: The accused was given an opportunity to refute the accusations.
sentences.cn: 被告被给予机会驳斥指控.

sentences.en: The meeting was very lively and informal with everyone chipping to supplement or refute what the speakers said.
sentences.cn: 会议开得很活跃,不拘束,每个人都能插话补充,或反驳发言者的讲话.

sentences.en: The technique can also be used to confirm or refute current theories.
sentences.cn: 该技术还可以用来证实或驳斥当前理论.

sentences.en: This does not completely refute the charge of subjectivism.
sentences.cn: 这样说并不能完全驳倒说我们是主观主义的责难.

trans.tran_en: to prove that a statement or idea is not correct
